The package moanin was developped to provide a simple and efficient workflow
for time-course gene expression data. It depends on packages from [bioconductor](https://www.bioconductor.org/)
and [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/).

- CRANÂ packages:

    - MASS (>= 1.0.0)
    - viridis
    - ClusterR
    - zoo

- Bioconductor packages:

    - edge (>= 2.4.0)
    - limma
    - edgeR
    - reshape2
    - NMI
    - topGO

To use this package, install it with

```{r eval=FALSE}
# install devtools
install.packages("devtools")
# use devtools to install moanin
devtools::install_github("NelleV/moanin")
```

Next, load the package into your namespace:

```{r}
library(moanin)
```

And you are ready to go!
